ML_TI_DOC.TI_TEXT: EBGU - Genopbygning af dampkedler i kraftvarmeværk
EBWE - Sanierung von Dampfkesseln in KWK
EBRD - Reconstruction of steam boilers in CHP

BERS - Ricostruzione di caldaie a vapore in cogenerazione
EBWO - Wederopbouw van stoomketels voor warmte-krachtkoppeling
BERD - Reconstrução de caldeiras a vapor em PCCE
EBRD - Återuppbyggnad av ångpannor i kraftvärmeproduktion (cogeneration of heat and power - CHP)
EBOR - Rekonstrukce parních kotlů v kogeneračním zařízení (CHP)
EBRD - Aurukatelde ümberehitus elektri ja soojuse koostootmises
EBRD - Gőzkazánok kapcsolt hő- és villamosenergia-termelő üzemben történő felújítása

ERAB - Koģenerācijas staciju (CHP) tvaika katlu atjaunošana
BERŻ - Rikostruzzjoni tal-bojlers tal-fwar fis-CHP (Sħana u Enerġija Kkombinati)
EBOR - Przebudowa kotłów parowych w elektrociepłowni
EBOR - Rekonštrukcia parných kotlov na kombinovanú výrobu tepla a elektrickej energie
EBOR - Sanacija parnih kotlov v napravi za kombinirano proizvodnjo toplote in električne energije
EBRD - Atógáil galchoirí i gcumhacht is teas in éineacht
ЕБВР - Реконструкция на парни котли в централа за комбинирано производство на топлинна и електрическа енергия
BERD - Reconstrucția cazanelor de abur utilizate în cogenerare
EBRD - Obnova parnih kotlova kogeneracijskog (CHP) postojenja

TI_DOC.P: EBGU - Genopbygning af dampkedler i kraftvarmeværk (KZ-Kostanay)

ADDRESS_NOT_STRUCT.ORGANISATION: State Communal Enterprise "Kostanay Heat and Power Company"

OLD.P: Closing date: 27.3.2018 at 15:00 Kostanay (local) time

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before or before 15:00 (local time) 27.3.2018, at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.

NEW.P: Closing date: 10.4.2018 at 15:00 Kostanay (local) time

Tenders must be delivered to the office at the address below on or before or before 15:00 (local time) 10.4.2018, at which time they will be opened in the presence of those tenderers’ representatives who choose to attend.
